short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your user experience on X (Twitter) by minimizing posts. Stop endless scrolling. Quit revisiting the same posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(New!) Focus Mode: Engage with one post at a time, minimizing distractions for a more immersive reading experience. 
(Please note, this might not work as expected if you are using it with collapse behaviour)

Minimize posts for a cleaner feed: Simplify your X(Twitter) feed by easily collapsing posts you've read or don't want to see.

Quit revisiting the same posts: Clean X ensures you don't waste time on posts you've already seen, allowing you to discover new content effortlessly.

Stop endless scrolling: Put an end to never-ending scrolling and gain control over your X(Twitter) experience.



Shortcuts: 
Mac: 
CTRL + 1 = previous post
CTRL + 2 = next post
CTRL + W = toggle post collapse

Windows: 
ALT + 1 = previous post
ALT + 2 = next post
ALT + W = toggle post collapse

(Posts are automatically expanded after 1 week. Customisable duration settings will be available in future updates.)
